subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस मंगल को पालक में है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: गोद्रम ज़मी, राजस्थान में Mehrangarh ज़मी का स्थान राजस्थान में स्थान राजस्थान में Mehrangarh Fort का स्थान क्या है?
EXPLANATION_EN: Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.
EXPLANATION_HI: Mehrangarh Fort, located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, is a famous fort.
